forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. South southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. North wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 62, with temperatures rising to around 64 overnight. North northeast wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 75. North northeast wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of smoke. Partly cloudy. Low around 59, with temperatures rising to around 61 overnight. North wind around 5 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
